title: Personal income taxes - effect on AD and AS

content.question: An increase in personal income taxes will most likely cause aggregate demand and aggregate supply to change in which of the following ways in the short run?

choices.label:
Aggregate Demand
 Aggregate Supply

Not change
 Decrease

Aggregate Demand
 Aggregate Supply

Not change
 Increase

Aggregate Demand
 Aggregate Supply

Decrease
 Not change

Aggregate Demand
 Aggregate Supply

Decrease
 Increase

Aggregate Demand
 Aggregate Supply

Increase
 Not change

content.answer:
Aggregate Demand
 Aggregate Supply

Decrease
 Not change

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
